resources.string: The hotel offers a concierge service and bicycles are available. It is a 10-minute walk from the Musée d\'Orsay the Luxembourg Gardens "and the Louvre Museum.
In the heart of Saint-Germain-des-Prés just 700 m from Notre-Dame Cathedral
elegant 19th-century building with its own private garden." " Spa facilities, in partnership with Guerlain, "are available on site.
43 Avenue Bugeaud, 16th arrondissement - Passy - Trocadero, Paris, France
One of the great classic Parisian café-brasseries in bustling Montparnasse, this one gets bragging rights for its long list of past clients
rab a newspaper and a café" crème, and plant yourself on the sunny terrace while you imagine the days when" Ernest Hemingway, Albert Camus, and Pablo Picasso rubbed elbows in this" very spot."
Across the street from rival Les Deux Magots, Le Cafe de Flore" " has changed little since World War II: red booths, wide mirrors, " "and an enviable clientele.
History Group Shop, 38 Avenue de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris

Perché sur le toit du " théâtre des Champs Elysées au 15 de l’Avenue " "Montaigne, le restaurant Maison Blanche surplombe " "Paris, offrant une vue imprenable sur la Tour " "Eiffel, les Invalides et la Seine.
En métro: Ligne 1 et 9 - Franklin D. Roosevelt" " Ligne 9 - Alma-Marceau
Dans un décor résolument contemporain, au 51 Avenue " "de la Motte-Picquet, le restaurant Crêperie Framboise vous fera " "découvrir autrement tous les plaisirs de la crêperie.

ave time at the Eiffel Tower and stay a step ahead " "of the crowds by choosing a priority-access ticket to the " "second level. Avoid the legendary lines at one of the " "world’s most-visited monuments."
History Group Shop, 38 Avenue de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris

Take a night cruise of the River Seine and see Paris " "illuminated for the night. Listen to the on board audio-guide " "commentary (available in 13 languages) to learn more about" " the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and other attractions.
Port de la Bourdonnais (at the foot of the Eiffel Tower), Pontoon No. 3, 75007 Paris
